title: 'Baltimore Sun' Probe Exposes 'Disturbing Pattern' Of Police Brutality
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to Mark Puentes, of The Baltimore Sun, whose investigation revealed the city paid about $5.7 million over 4 years to settle suits from citizens accusing police of excessive force.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
